t: Amazon.com: Hasbro Gaming Boggle
s: I had to replace my travel Boggle game after over 30 years of use. (I' m pushing 80) The old one had a red opaque top and the person shaking the Boggle could not see the letters. This one has a clear opaque top. There is also a clip to hold the timer in the lid.

t: Amazon.com: Body Boggle : Toys & Games
s: Two players from each team use their hands and feet to spell out words on the letter mat. The first word's not too hard to stretch and spell, but just try rearranging hands and feet to spell the next word. And the next. And the next...It's the word game that's truly body-boggling!
